Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fungi:Neurospora crassa (MIC=7 µM), Aspergillus fumigatus (MIC=50 µM), Alternaria brassicicola (MIC=10 µM), Nectria haematococca (MIC=7 µM), Fusarium culmorum (MIC=20 µM), F. oxyporum (MIC=50 µM), Trichophyton mentagrophytes (MIC=50 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Antibacterial and antifungal activities of vasostatin-1, the N-terminal fragment of chromogranin A.
Literature.Author: Lugardon K, Raffner R, Goumon Y, Corti A, Delmas A, Bulet P, Aunis D, Metz-Boutigue MH.
